alert.note: Alert for Butts; Henry; Lamar; Monroe; Spalding (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 02 at 5:37PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Spalding, north central Monroe, southeastern Henry, Butts and northeastern Lamar Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 537 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over McKibben, or 7 miles west of Jackson, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Jackson, Locust Grove, Flovilla, Jenkinsburg, High Falls State Park, Blount, Worthville, Walker Mill, McKibben, Indian Springs State Park and Stark. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
